price: Awoͻ yeaa no de no kͻͻ akyiresua dua bi ho. Ɔkaa sε: “Ɛkaa menko a anka medii kan wui ansa na (asεm) woi (reba), anka yεwerε afri me koraa”.
arabic: فَأَجَآءَهَا ٱلۡمَخَاضُ إِلَىٰ جِذۡعِ ٱلنَّخۡلَةِ قَالَتۡ يَٰلَيۡتَنِي مِتُّ قَبۡلَ هَٰذَا وَكُنتُ نَسۡيٗا مَّنسِيّٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: fa-ajāahā al-makhāḍu ilā jidh'ʿi al-nakhlati qālat yālaytanī mittu qabla hādhā wakuntu nasyan mansiyyan
